reference.title: Accessing or disconnecting a shared Translation Memory

section.p: To use a Translation Memory that is shared by many translators you must include it in your list of local Translation Memory databases. To remove it from this list you must disconnect it.

section.title: Calling sequence
section.p:
Select:
The Translation Memory List window from the workbench
Connect shared resources... from the Utilities menu
The Connect Shared Translation Memories window is displayed.

plentry.pd: Lists all Translation Memory databases available on shared disks.
Adds the selected Translation Memory name to the Selected box.
Removes the selected Translation Memory name from the Selected box but does not delete the Translation Memory.

Lists all Translation Memory databases selected. When you select Connect the listed Translation Memory databases will be connected. Translation Memory databases removed from this list are disconnected.

section.title: Results
section.p: The selected Translation Memory has been added to your local list window and can now be used like any other Translation Memory. If you selected to remove it from your list window, it is disconnected.
